SELECT ca.confirm_number, ca.name, ca.child_name, ca.child_birth_date, ca.child_resi_regi_number, ca.start_date, ca.end_date, ca.confirm_number,
ca.status_code,
c.name AS statusName
FROM TB_CONFIRM_APPLICATION ca LEFT JOIN TB_CODE c ON c.code = ca.status_code
WHERE ca.status_code IN ('ST_20', 'ST_30', 'ST_50') AND NVL(ca.delt_at, 'N') = 'N'
AND ca.status_code = #{status}
AND UPPER(ca.child_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{nameKeyword}) || '%'
AND ca.child_resi_regi_number = #{regNoKeyword}
AND NVL(ca.delt_at, 'N') = 'N' ORDER BY CASE ca.status_code WHEN 'ST_20' THEN 1 WHEN 'ST_30' THEN 2 WHEN 'ST_50' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, ca.confirm_number DESC OFFSET #{pageDTO.startList} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageDTO.listSize} ROWS ONLY
